thread.title: Two exclusive 12 page Ashes supplements
thread.title_full: Two exclusive 12 page Ashes supplements - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Two exclusive 12 page Ashes supplements
text: In anticipation of this years Ashes series, we're giving away two 12 page Ashes supplements - one with Monday's paper, and one with Tuesday's. The first will provide exclusive content surrounding England's historic ashes win in 2005, feautring columns from the Telegraph's own cricketing legends Kevin Pietersen and Michael Vaughn, alongside an interview with then coach Duncan Fletcher. The supplement will also include a discussion with Australian great and now Telegraph columnist Glenn Mcgrath. The second supplement will look ahead to this years series, with further exciting content such as an exclusive round table discussion with Vaughan, Geoffrey Boycott and our two cricket writers Sclyd Berry and Nick Hoult, in addition to a column by Ian Chappel on the legendary Australin cricketer Richie Benaud - who passed away earleir this year. On top of all this will be profiles of the two captains - Alastair Cook and Michael Clarke, a low down on every Test, plus guides to all of the players. How to Claim: See the newspapers on Monday, July 6, 2015 and Tuesday, July 7, 2015 Follow @telegraph
